remedy.title: Nani's Soothing Heartburn Relief
remedy.description: Beta, heartburn happens when stomach acid comes up. Don't worry, Nani has gentle remedies to cool that fire in your chest.
steps: Soak fennel seeds in warm water for 10 minutes
Strain the water and add baking soda
Mix in honey and drink slowly
Sit upright for 30 minutes after drinking
precautions: Don't lie down immediately after eating
If severe chest pain persists, see a doctor immediately

remedies.when_to_see_doctor: If heartburn occurs more than twice a week or chest pain is severe

remedy.title: Nani's Magical Cold Remedy
remedy.description: Beta, cold is nature's way of telling you to rest. Let Nani's warm remedies help you feel better quickly.
steps: Boil water with ginger and tulsi leaves for 5 minutes
Add turmeric and black pepper
Strain and let it cool slightly
Add honey when warm (not hot)
Drink slowly while warm
precautions: Don't add honey to very hot liquid

remedies.when_to_see_doctor: If fever exceeds 102°F or symptoms worsen after 7 days

remedy.title: Nani's Gentle Head Relief
remedy.description: Beta, headaches can come from stress, lack of sleep, or dehydration. These gentle remedies will ease your pain.
steps: Mix peppermint oil with coconut oil
Gently massage temples and forehead
Prepare ginger tea with warm water
Drink slowly and rest in a quiet place
Apply cold compress on forehead if needed
precautions: Rest in a dark, quiet room

remedies.when_to_see_doctor: If headache is sudden and severe, or accompanied by fever and stiff neck

remedy.title: Nani's Cooling Fever Treatment
remedy.description: Beta, fever is body's way of fighting infection. Let's help cool you down naturally and safely.
steps: Soak coriander seeds in water overnight
Strain and drink the water in morning
Prepare turmeric milk with warm milk
Make mint tea for cooling effect
Take lukewarm baths to reduce temperature

remedies.when_to_see_doctor: If fever exceeds 103°F or persists for more than 3 days

remedy.title: Nani's Soothing Cough Syrup
remedy.description: Beta, cough can be dry or with phlegm. This natural syrup will soothe your throat and clear congestion.
steps: Mix honey with fresh ginger juice
Add turmeric and black pepper
Add few drops of lemon juice
Take one spoonful slowly
Let it coat your throat before swallowing
precautions: Don't give honey to children under 1 year

remedies.when_to_see_doctor: If cough persists for more than 2 weeks or blood in cough

remedy.title: Nani's Healing Throat Remedy
remedy.description: Beta, sore throat needs gentle care and warmth. These remedies will heal and soothe your throat.
steps: Mix salt in warm water for gargling
Gargle 3-4 times daily
Chew cloves slowly for numbing effect
Take turmeric honey mixture twice daily
Drink warm liquids throughout day
precautions: Don't use very hot water for gargling
remedy.effectiveness: Pain relief within hours, healing in 2-3 days

remedies.when_to_see_doctor: If throat pain is severe or accompanied by high fever

remedy.title: Nani's Tummy Soother
remedy.description: Beta, stomach ache usually comes from gas or indigestion. These gentle remedies will ease your discomfort.
steps: Boil ajwain in water for 5 minutes
Add ginger powder and hing
Strain and add honey when warm
Drink slowly while warm
Gently massage stomach in circular motions

remedies.when_to_see_doctor: If pain is severe, persistent, or accompanied by vomiting

remedy.title: Nani's Balance Restorer
remedy.description: Beta, dizziness can come from low blood pressure or dehydration. These remedies will help you feel steady.
steps: Mix all ingredients in water
Drink slowly while sitting
Rest with feet elevated
Take deep, slow breaths
Avoid sudden movements

remedies.when_to_see_doctor: If dizziness is severe, frequent, or accompanied by chest pain

remedy.title: Nani's Nausea Calmer
remedy.description: Beta, nausea makes everything uncomfortable. These gentle remedies will settle your stomach naturally.
steps: Grate ginger and boil in water
Add mint leaves and simmer
Strain and add lemon juice
Add honey when cool
Sip slowly in small amounts
remedy.duration: Sip throughout the day as needed

remedies.when_to_see_doctor: If vomiting is persistent or you can't keep fluids down

remedy.title: Nani's Gentle Digestive Aid
remedy.description: Beta, constipation happens when we don't drink enough water or eat enough fiber. These remedies will help naturally.
steps: Soak figs overnight and eat in morning
Mix triphala in warm water, drink at bedtime
Add ghee to warm milk and drink
Soak flax seeds and eat with water
Drink plenty of water throughout day
remedy.duration: Continue until regular bowel movements return

remedies.when_to_see_doctor: If constipation persists for more than a week or severe pain

wellness_advice.description: Natural techniques to manage daily stress and find inner peace

advice.title: Nani's Stress Relief Techniques
advice.introduction: Beta, stress is part of life, but we can't let it control us. These ancient techniques will help you find peace.
steps: Practice deep breathing: Inhale for 4 counts, hold for 4, exhale for 6
Do gentle neck and shoulder rolls to release tension
Practice gratitude: Write 3 things you're thankful for daily
Take short walks in nature or fresh air
Listen to calming music or chant 'Om' for 5 minutes

precautions: If stress is overwhelming, talk to someone

wellness_advice.description: Natural ways to calm anxiety and restore inner balance

advice.title: Nani's Anxiety Calming Methods
advice.introduction: Beta, anxiety makes your heart race and mind worry. These gentle techniques will bring you peace.
steps: Practice 4-7-8 breathing: Inhale 4, hold 7, exhale 8
Use grounding technique: Name 5 things you see, 4 you hear, 3 you touch
Gentle yoga poses: Child's pose, legs up the wall
Chamomile tea or warm milk with nutmeg
Progressive muscle relaxation from toes to head
advice.best_time: When feeling anxious or before stressful situations

precautions: If anxiety is severe, seek professional help

wellness_advice.description: Natural methods to improve sleep quality and overcome insomnia

advice.title: Nani's Sleep Enhancement Ritual
advice.introduction: Beta, good sleep is medicine for body and mind. These rituals will help you sleep like a baby.
steps: Create bedtime routine: Same time every night
Warm oil massage on feet and scalp
Drink warm milk with pinch of turmeric and nutmeg
Practice gentle stretches or child's pose
Keep bedroom cool, dark, and quiet
advice.duration: Follow routine for 30 minutes before bed

precautions: No heavy meals 3 hours before sleep

wellness_advice.description: Natural ways to boost energy levels throughout the day

advice.title: Nani's Energy Revival Techniques
advice.introduction: Beta, feeling tired is body's way of asking for care. These natural methods will restore your vitality.
steps: Start day with warm lemon water and honey
Practice energizing breathing: Breath of fire (Bhastrika)
Eat iron-rich foods: Dates, raisins, spinach
Take short power naps (15-20 minutes)
Gentle exercise: Walking, stretching, yoga
advice.best_time: Morning rituals and afternoon energy dips

precautions: If fatigue is persistent, check for underlying conditions
